reviewText: beautiful, amazing - every person should own a copy. Antonia

I am truly in awe of this breathtaking production.  Oprah has gone over the moon with this program.
I would recommend it to anyone, anywhere, anytime.  As a video producer, I truly appreciate the skill and respect shown in this program which delves into Beliefs and Searching of the Soul worldwide.
Thank you,Oprah.
A nice mini-series on different beliefs around the world. Not so much a documentary on world religions, but more of "what my religion means to me."
I bought this as a gift for my mom. She enjoys watching it and learns a lot from it.

If something is calling you to watch this, then I promise it is the right answer to pull the trigger and buy it. It is one of the most moving things I have ever watched. I cried every episode. It is so beautifully done as well.
It was everything i thought it would be...it is a definite must see!

amazing movie especially for someone understanding religous traditions and beliefs. even thow we think we are different we clearly share a common goal of belief in something more. i think we all should introduce and share this with everyone so they can understand and see others andbe more excepting in this world.
Superb cinematography and storytelling. I had to own it.
